SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = 'published'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (title, content, summary, category, author, image_url, view_count, publish_time, created_at, updated_at, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{category}, #{author}, #{imageUrl}, #{viewCount}, #{publishTime}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, summary = #{summary}, category = #{category}, author = #{author},
image_url = #{imageUrl},
view_count = #{viewCount},
status = #{status},
publish_time = #{publishTime}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE news SET view_count = COALESCE(view_count, 0) + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, summary, category, author, image_url, view_count, publish_time, created_at, updated_at, status FROM news WHERE status = 'published' AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')) ORDER BY publish_time DESC
